item.title: Executing Shell Scripts With NodeJS
item.description: One of the problems Iâ€™ve been faced with recently is how do I go about executing shell scripts using NodeJS. This essentially allows me to query the status of certain processes and utilize the full power of the unix shell commands. Implementation using NodeJS child_process Module Node thankfully already has a module which is designed specifically for executing shell scripts and can be found here in the documentation. This module essentially creates a child process in which we can execute our shell script and also sets everything up for us so that we can utilize stdin, stdout and stderr within our NodeJS application.
